warezcdn.name: Youjo Senki
warezcdn.title: Yojo Senki: Saga of Tanya the Evil

imdb.title: Yojo Senki: Saga of Tanya the Evil
imdb.plot: A girl with blond hair, blue eyes, and porcelain skin fights on the front lines of a brutal war and climbs the ranks of the imperial army.

episodes.title: Operation Desert Pasta
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: The Devil of the Rhine
episodes.plot: A mage platoon supplies air support during battle. The leader of the platoon is a little girl--Second Lieutenant Tanya Degurechaff. One of her soldiers realizes something about the Second Lieutenant seems terrifying.

episodes.title: Prologue
episodes.plot: Tanya's secret background is revealed as an unwilling recipient of reincarnation by a godlike being who demands that she worship him.

episodes.title: Deus Vult
episodes.plot: More of Tanya's background as a new soldier for the Empire is revealed. She must test dangerous magic jewels amidst interference by the godlike being. Her desperate effort to avoid dangers of a test pilot mage lands her on the front lines.

episodes.title: Campus Life
episodes.plot: The main forces has arrived to the Rheine theater. Tanya is ordered to leave the front and join the university. During her studies she meet Hans von Zettour and propose him the the first world war and to create a mage battalion.

episodes.title: My First Battalion
episodes.plot: Tanya's new battalion is off the ground and running, and it's time for them to do their first mission: fight back a massive invasion!

episodes.title: Beginning of Madness
episodes.plot: After her easy victory over Dakia, it's time for a more difficult mission: aiding the destruction of the Entente Alliance to the north.

episodes.title: The Battle of the Fjord
episodes.plot: The Empire is launching a seemingly foolish attack on the Entente Alliance in the middle of winter. They lack the supplies to successfully invade, but Tanya realizes that this attack is intended to distract from the real mission.

episodes.title: Trial by Fire
episodes.plot: The war with the Entente Alliance is done, and it's back to the Rhine for Tanya and her forces. The Republic troops are highly trained and stronger than any she's faced before.

episodes.title: Preparations for Advance
episodes.plot: The last enemy on the continent is the Republic, and the Empire has come up with a bold plan to take them out. Of course, Tanya is sent to the forefront of this operation, and is forced to take on the entire Republic army by herself!

episodes.title: The Path to Victory
episodes.plot: Tanya's mission is a success, and the Republic is surrounded and crippled. But on her way back, she runs into a group of allied mages lead by Anton Souix, whose one mission in life is to take down the Devil of the Rhine!

episodes.title: Resistance
episodes.plot: As Tanya's battalion carries out their final mission, they are attacked by defensive forces. They launch a counterattack, and come out victorious. This seemingly ends the war - but Tanya soon realizes the celebration may be premature.

episodes.title: How to Use a Victory
episodes.plot: The victory celebration for the 203rd mage battalion has been cut short. Republican forces are still active on the Southern Continent. Generals Zettour and Rudersdorf decide to send Tanya and her battalion to eliminate the enemy once and for all.
